name: Furry Spy Simulator: Hot Springs
description:
Enter the serene yet thrilling world of 'Furry Spy Simulator', a short but replayable experience set on the periphery of a steamy Japanese onsen.

Each session offers a unique blend of calm and erotic undertones, combined with spikes of heart-racing tension.

Your objective: to find the perfect angles for observation without being noticed. Engage in a unique form of exploration, influenced by the ever-changing schedules of the characters you’re observing.

'Furry Spy Simulator' isn’t just about seeing; it’s about mastering the art of blending in, relishing the thrill of the hunt, and experiencing the satisfaction of undiscovered watching.



Featuring:
  • Optional One-Handed Mouse Controls: Enjoy the game with ease, allowing for a more relaxed gameplay experience.
  • Dynamic Character Placement: Discover new surprises in every game session, enhancing replayability.
  • Strategic Hiding Spots: Master the art of stealth and strategy to observe without being detected.
